alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 10:34PM EDT until May 16 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bertie County in northeastern North Carolina... Northampton County in northeastern North Carolina... Hertford County in northeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Gates County in northeastern North Carolina... * Until 1115 PM EDT. * At 1033 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Gaston to near Halifax to 14 miles south of Littleton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Garysburg around 1040 PM EDT. Seaboard around 1045 PM EDT. Rich Square around 1055 PM EDT. Conway and Woodland around 1100 PM EDT. Murfreesboro, Chowan University and Roxobel around 1110 PM EDT. Ahoskie, Aulander, Winton, Cofield, Powellsville and Como around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Eagletown, Milwaukee, Tunis, Kelford, Earleys, Gum Forks, Menola, Chowan Beach, Topsy and Mapleton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
